item.description:
It's time for another pub crawl! Earlier this year I organized a successful pub crawl with my connections on Facebook that went down Boylston Street in Boston. This time, let's switch it up - we'll move to Landsdowne Street during Red Sox season!

Here's the schedule:

2pm - Boston Beer Works
3pm - Game On
4pm - Cask'n Flagon
5pm - Bleacher Bar
6pm - House of Blues
7pm - Landsdowne Pub
8pm - Jillian's

I already checked - the Sox are not playing until 10:10 pm as they are out to Seattle and so far there are no shows scheduled for the House of Blues that Saturday night.

After the crawl we could play some BIG BALL BOWLING at Jillian's... this should make for some interesting bowling.

Please RSVP and invite EVERY ONE of your friends! The more, the merrier!

I recognize that there was just a pub crawl on July 10 - I had already sent out invites through Facebook to my connections and Jon was gracious enough to let me organize this one for the meetup group. I hope you can make it out!

I will give out my cell phone to those who RSVP Yes prior to July 24.
item.name: Landsdowne Street Pub Crawl
